title: End of Game Gifting
body:
Summoners,

You may be aware that End of Game Gifting is now available on OCE. Unfortunately you may not be aware when someone has generously gifted you an awesome skin or champion, and that's not cool.

We are aware that the congratulatory messaging that should be displaying with a gift is not showing up all the time when an End of Game Gift is sent, but please be assured we are working to get this rectified as quickly as possible.

In the mean time keep being awesome summoners and showing your fellow players appreciation and we will update this thread with new information as it becomes available.

EDIT:

Hey Guys,
An update to this post. End of Game Gifting is now working as intended, which means anytime you are lucky enough to receive a gift, you will be notified via  cool pop up animation.

-ToxicHawk

replies.body: RIOT ADD A NEW FEMALE CHAMP WITH BIG TITS
Still yet to be gifted. I ought to feed to give the enemy gold, so that they will repay my kindness.
I dont think anyone will ever gift me?
